CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1946, pg. 1, reads: "HOMELESS - The Benjamin family, 2158 Webster Avenue, was one of the three families in apartment rendered homeless by flames late Wednesday evening. Shown in the picture above are: Gus Benjamin, with wife and family, Pearl Benjamin, Josephine, three years of age, and Dorothy, nine months old.  Twenty families in all are without homes as a result of the five-alarm conflagration. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Gus Benjamin, Pearl Benjamin holding baby Dorothy, and Josephine Benjamin, posed in interior with trunk piled with clothes beside them
